name: Suckerpunch-XL Cannon
description:
Manufacturer: Joker Engineering
Item Type: Distortion Cannon
Size: 3
When you want to catch your prey without doing damage use the Suckerpunch. This size three distortion cannon from Joker depletes the target's power system, making it an excellent and effective non-lethal addition to your arsenal.
description_cn:
制造商：小丑工程(Joker Engineering)
物品类型：畸变加农炮
尺寸：3
当你想要在不伤害猎物的情况下抓住猎物，用“垂死挣扎”吧。小丑的S3畸变加农炮能够消耗目标的能源系统，这种能力使它成为你武器库中出色有效的非致命性武器。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Centermass_NewBabbage
